    <item>
      <title>Trump and the Artifice of the Deal</title>
      <link>http://www.politico.com/magazine/story/2016/05/donald-trump-2016-father-artifice-of-the-deal-213888</link>
      <description>How an old hotel covered with glass, underwritten by his father, became the Donald’s first big success as a “self-made” man.</description>
      <pubDate>Thu, 12 May 2016 22:35:36 GMT</pubDate>
      <dc:creator>Simon van Zuylen-Wood</dc:creator>
      <guid isPermaLink="true">http://www.politico.com/magazine/story/2016/05/donald-trump-2016-father-artifice-of-the-deal-213888</guid>
    </item>
    <item>
      <title>The U.S. Army’s War Over Russia</title>
      <link>http://www.politico.com/magazine/story/2016/05/army-internal-fight-russia-defense-budget-213885</link>
      <description>Top brass profess to be really worried about Putin. But a growing group of dissenters say they’re overreacting to get a bigger share of the defense budget.</description>
      <pubDate>Thu, 12 May 2016 10:48:49 GMT</pubDate>
      <dc:creator>(Mark Perry)</dc:creator>
      <guid isPermaLink="true">http://www.politico.com/magazine/story/2016/05/army-internal-fight-russia-defense-budget-213885</guid>
    </item>
    <item>
      <title>6 Alternate Realities That Could Have Stopped Trump</title>
      <link>http://www.politico.com/magazine/story/2016/05/stop-donald-trump-2016-gop-alternate-reality-213887</link>
      <description>If only we could go back in time and tweak a few things, the GOP might be on a different path today.</description>
      <pubDate>Wed, 11 May 2016 22:45:17 GMT</pubDate>
      <dc:creator>(Matt Latimer)</dc:creator>
      <guid isPermaLink="true">http://www.politico.com/magazine/story/2016/05/stop-donald-trump-2016-gop-alternate-reality-213887</guid>
    </item>
    <item>
      <title>Bernie Sanders, the Zombie Candidate</title>
      <link>http://www.politico.com/magazine/story/2016/05/2016-primary-campaign-bernie-sanders-hillary-clinton-2004-lessons-kerry-dean-edwards-gephardt-213884</link>
      <description>It’s already over, and now he’s just causing havoc. I’ve seen firsthand how much damage this kind of candidacy can do.</description>
      <pubDate>Thu, 12 May 2016 09:24:34 GMT</pubDate>
      <dc:creator>David Wade</dc:creator>
      <guid isPermaLink="true">http://www.politico.com/magazine/story/2016/05/2016-primary-campaign-bernie-sanders-hillary-clinton-2004-lessons-kerry-dean-edwards-gephardt-213884</guid>
    </item>
    <item>
      <title>The Tiny Scottish Village That Spawned Trump</title>
      <link>http://www.politico.com/magazine/story/2016/05/donald-trump-scottish-village-scotland-mother-213882</link>
      <description>He doesn’t talk much about his mother’s ancestral home, but people here still talk about him.</description>
      <pubDate>Wed, 11 May 2016 10:28:59 GMT</pubDate>
      <dc:creator>Peter Geoghegan</dc:creator>
      <guid isPermaLink="true">http://www.politico.com/magazine/story/2016/05/donald-trump-scottish-village-scotland-mother-213882</guid>
    </item>
    <item>
      <title>Why I Caved on Guns When I Ran for Governor of Texas</title>
      <link>http://www.politico.com/magazine/story/2015/12/wendy-davis-open-carry-gun-rights-texas-213423</link>
      <description>I was part of the reason we can't make progress on the issue. And I regret it every day.</description>
      <pubDate>Wed, 09 Dec 2015 02:42:17 GMT</pubDate>
      <dc:creator>Wendy Davis</dc:creator>
      <guid isPermaLink="true">http://www.politico.com/magazine/story/2015/12/wendy-davis-open-carry-gun-rights-texas-213423</guid>
    </item>
    <item>
      <title>Ben Rhodes and the Tough Sell of Obama's Foreign Policy</title>
      <link>http://www.politico.com/magazine/story/2016/05/ben-rhodes-nytimes-tough-sell-of-obamas-foreign-policy-213883</link>
      <description>The Times profile of an overweening aide missed the substance of his beliefs, and why they've been so easily vilified.</description>
      <pubDate>Tue, 10 May 2016 23:56:42 GMT</pubDate>
      <author>mgrunwald@politico.com (Michael Grunwald)</author>
      <guid isPermaLink="true">http://www.politico.com/magazine/story/2016/05/ben-rhodes-nytimes-tough-sell-of-obamas-foreign-policy-213883</guid>
    </item>
    <item>
      <title>Why Trump Won’t Get Sanders’ Supporters</title>
      <link>http://www.politico.com/magazine/story/2016/05/2016-donald-trump-bernie-sanders-supporters-bernie-bros-213881</link>
      <description>He’s making a populist play for ‘Bernie Bros’ in the Midwest, but the ideological differences are too great.</description>
      <pubDate>Tue, 10 May 2016 09:17:36 GMT</pubDate>
      <dc:creator>(Bill Scher)</dc:creator>
      <guid isPermaLink="true">http://www.politico.com/magazine/story/2016/05/2016-donald-trump-bernie-sanders-supporters-bernie-bros-213881</guid>
    </item>
    <item>
      <title>How the New York Times Magazine Botched Its Iran Story</title>
      <link>http://www.politico.com/magazine/story/2016/05/2016-new-york-times-magazine-david-samuels-ben-rhodes-iran-nuclear-deal-213880</link>
      <description>None of us was taking the Obama administration’s word for it on the Iran nuclear deal.</description>
      <pubDate>Mon, 09 May 2016 22:15:03 GMT</pubDate>
      <dc:creator>Joe Cirincione</dc:creator>
      <guid isPermaLink="true">http://www.politico.com/magazine/story/2016/05/2016-new-york-times-magazine-david-samuels-ben-rhodes-iran-nuclear-deal-213880</guid>
    </item>
    <item>
      <title>How Obama Manipulates the News</title>
      <link>http://www.politico.com/magazine/story/2016/05/how-obama-manipulates-the-news-213877</link>

    <item>
      <title>The One Man Who Could Stop Donald Trump</title>
      <link>http://www.politico.com/magazine/story/2016/05/republican-convention-stop-donald-trump-curly-haugland-213879</link>
      <description>For years, Curly Haugland’s command of the GOP rulebook made him a pariah. This year, he could be the establishment’s last hope to stop its nightmare nominee.</description>
      <pubDate>Mon, 09 May 2016 22:46:53 GMT</pubDate>
      <dc:creator>Erick Trickey</dc:creator>
      <guid isPermaLink="true">http://www.politico.com/magazine/story/2016/05/republican-convention-stop-donald-trump-curly-haugland-213879</guid>
    </item>
    <item>
      <title>Why China’s Not Afraid of Donald J. Trump</title>
      <link>http://www.politico.com/magazine/story/2016/05/2016-donald-trump-china-foreign-policy-asia-beijing-213876</link>
      <description>No matter how much he trashes the country, the Chinese media love The Donald.</description>
      <pubDate>Sun, 08 May 2016 23:05:13 GMT</pubDate>
      <dc:creator>Aaron Mak</dc:creator>
      <guid isPermaLink="true">http://www.politico.com/magazine/story/2016/05/2016-donald-trump-china-foreign-policy-asia-beijing-213876</guid>
    </item>
    <item>
      <title>5 Things You Need to Know About the Coming Trump vs. Clinton Showdown</title>
      <link>http://www.politico.com/magazine/story/2016/05/2016-donald-trump-hillary-clinton-election-things-you-should-know-213875</link>
      <description>What to expect if The Donald doesn’t change course, and what to expect if he does.</description>
      <pubDate>Sun, 08 May 2016 20:26:07 GMT</pubDate>
      <dc:creator>(Geoffrey Skelley)</dc:creator>
      <guid isPermaLink="true">http://www.politico.com/magazine/story/2016/05/2016-donald-trump-hillary-clinton-election-things-you-should-know-213875</guid>
    </item>
    <item>
      <title>Why Middle Eastern Leaders Are Talking to Putin, Not Obama</title>
      <link>http://www.politico.com/magazine/story/2016/05/putin-obama-middle-east-leaders-213867</link>
      <description>Russia’s less dominant militarily but more willing to act, and that has changed the dynamics in the region.</description>
      <pubDate>Sun, 08 May 2016 11:53:48 GMT</pubDate>
      <dc:creator>(Dennis Ross)</dc:creator>
      <guid isPermaLink="true">http://www.politico.com/magazine/story/2016/05/putin-obama-middle-east-leaders-213867</guid>
    </item>
    <item>
